title: Executive Order 8583-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 5886 of July 12, 1932, Withdrawing Public Lands
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, c. 421, 36 Stat. 847, Executive Order No. 5886 of July 12, 1932, withdrawing public lands in Wyoming pending a resurvey, is hereby revoked as to the following-described township:
This order shall become effective upon the date of the official filing of the plat of the resurvey of the above-described township.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 8583-Partial Revocation of Executive Order No. 5886 of July 12, 1932, Withdrawing Public Lands Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/368436
